credit_line: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
title: Knife
description: Blade with straight sides and leaf-shaped point, hollow bolster. Ferrules silver-gilt with floral pattern. Tapered handles of ivory and bone inlaid in triangular pattern. In middle of handle black inlaid dots and two horizontal bands. Silver-gilt caps with floral pattern on end of handle.
name: Knife
